lead_paragraph: The Maersk Line said it was pleased that Iran had freed the ship, the Maersk Tigris, and its 24-member crew after talks with the Iranian authorities.

headline.print_headline: Iran Releases Cargo Vessel, Shipper Says
headline.main: Impounded Cargo Ship in Strait of Hormuz Is Released by Iran

snippet: The Maersk Line said it was pleased that Iran had freed the ship, the Maersk Tigris, and its 24-member crew after talks with the Iranian authorities.
abstract: Iran releases Maersk Line cargo ship that was detained in Strait of Hormuz after talks between shipping company and Iranian authorities.
